counter.name: PS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice1 Thread Dispatcher
counter.description: The percentage of time in which PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice1 thread dispatcher

counter.name: VS EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex shaders were stalled on the EUs.

counter.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice1 Subslice2 Thread Dispatcher Port 1
counter.description: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice1 subslice2 thread dispatcher port 1

counter.name: Shader Memory Accesses
counter.description: The total number of shader memory accesses to L3.

counter.name: VS AVG Active per Thread
counter.description: The average number of cycles per hardware thread run in which vertex shaders were processed actively on the EUs.

counter.name: HS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of hull shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: PS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice2 Thread Dispatcher
counter.description: The percentage of time in which PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice2 thread dispatcher

counter.name: SLM Bytes Written
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written into shared local memory.

counter.name: L3 Shader Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between shaders and L3 caches w/o URB.
counter.equation: A 30 READ A 31 READ $ShaderMemoryAccesses 64 UMUL UADD UADD

counter.name: Samples Killed in FS
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels dropped in fragment shaders.

counter.name: Samples Written
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: Non-PS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice1 Thread Dispatcher
counter.description: The percentage of time in which non-PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice1 thread dispatcher
